title: Google Calendar: Time Insights
content: Google Calendar’s Time Insights functionality allows you to see trends in how you spend your time and with whom you spend your time. While there are more robust solutions out there to provide insights into time expenditure (like Timeular , Clockwise , Automate.io , Timing , Webtime Tracker ), Google calendar’s Time Insights feature is free and included with your Google Enterprise access at Simpli.fi. In this quick tutorial, I’ll show you how to gain visibility of your time expenditure--in a way that is customizable to your own categorization and color scheme. For more information, see additional documentation: View How You Spend Time in Meetings (from Google Help Center) How to Use Google Calendar (from Zapier)
